title: Review: 661 Recon D3O Knee Pads offer ultra-flexible, lightweight, breathable protection
content:
SixSixOne have just released some seriously lightweight, flexible, breathable D3O elbow and knee pads for mountain biking. Thanks to the new D3O Ghost Pad, the 661 Recon D3O pads are, by a country mile, the most flexible knee pads we’ve tested yet. For mellow trail and XC riding, these compete strongly with some of the […]

The post Review: 661 Recon D3O Knee Pads offer ultra-flexible, lightweight, breathable protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
